## gulp-mini-css
> css minfy plugin

## Usage

```
var css = require('gulp-mini-css');

gulp.task('css', function(){
    gulp.src(dest+'/*.css')
        .pipe(css({ext:'-min.css'}))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(dest));
});

```

配合less编译：


```
gulp.task('css', function(){
    gulp.src(src+'/*.less')
        .pipe(less())
        .pipe(gulp.dest(dest))
        .pipe(css({ext:'-min.css'}))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(dest));
});

```

自动编译：

```
gulp.task('watch', function() {
    gulp.watch(src+'/**/*.less', ['css']);
});

```
